newsitems.title: Team Fortress 2 Update Released
newsitems.contents: An update to Team Fortress 2 has been released. The update will be applied automatically when you restart Team Fortress 2. The major changes include: * Fixed a case where crouching was used to see outside of the playable area. This could be exploited to place buildings at invalid locations. ;* Fixed...

newsitems.title: Tip of the Hats 2016
newsitems.contents: Tip of the Hats 2016 is starting this coming weekend! Join the fun September 16th through the 18th, from 9am to 9pm PST, or check out the live stream on Twitch. Tip of the Hats is a charity event hosted and supported by members of the TF community. Since 2013, it has raised over $320,000 for Childre...

newsitems.title: The 2016 UGC League Fall Season is Starting!
newsitems.contents: Prepare yourself, the UGC League Fall Season is about to start! Join the 1,000 teams that played last season for some competitive TF2 action! The first week of matches starts late this month: September 21st for 6v6, September 24th for 4v4, and September 26th for Highlander. UGC has over 8,000 play...

newsitems.title: Infiltrate randomly generated cults ruled by the voices of GLaDOS and TF2's Sniper
newsitems.contents: The Church in the Darkness plays like top down Hitman-lite in a 1970s religious cult. Your character decides to check in on a relative and infiltrates the sect to figure out how they're doing and what's really going on at church camp. You navigate buildings and avoid the scrutiny of the cultists by ...

newsitems.title: Team Fortress 2 gets equipped with Mega Man map, thanks to talented modder
newsitems.contents: Every once in awhile you find a crossover between two different videogames that on paper makes no sense until you see it in action. That's how I feel about Steam user Pancake's " MegaMan 6 " collection of TF2 maps. Divided up into eight separate arenas themed after a different boss, you can now wax ...

newsitems.title: Announcing ETF2L's 25th Season
newsitems.contents: The European Team Fortress 2 League (ETF2L) Season 25 schedule and signups have opened! The season is kicking off with a 6v6 cup, testing new maps and weapon pickups. Signups are open until September 15th at 21:00 CEST. Any 6v6 or Fun Team that has 6 players on the roster at the end of signups is ...

newsitems.title: We Turned 20 Today!
newsitems.contents: Team Fortress turns 20 today, and that means we're celebrating! Jump in a game and enjoy hats, cake, beach balls, presents, confetti and more cake! newsitems.contents: The Multiplay Insomnia Gaming Festival is one of the biggest annual gaming tournaments, not to mention one of the highest profile TF2 competitions in the world. newsitems.title: Team Fortress 2 Update Released
newsitems.author: Valve
newsitems.contents: An update to Team Fortress 2 has been released. The update will be applied automatically when you restart Team Fortress 2. The major changes include: * Fixed a common server crash that primarily occurred during Mann vs. Machine matches; * Fixed a memory leak for OS X and Linux clients;
